page.title: 05BERRYNARBOR VILLAGE
page.content: Berrynarbor is a small village. Most of the houses in the middle of the village and Hagginton Hill are old cottages and onthe outside of the old village new bungalows and houses have been built.There are three shops in the viiage, a Post Office-Stores, Manor stores and a Butchers shop Miss Muffets tea rooms opens in the summer. The roads into the village are narrow and windy. Berrynarbor is a very well cared for village. This year we are entering the best kept village competition. Lots of people come to walk around the village because it is so pretty. People keep their gardens looking attractive by planting flowers in their gardens and putting baskets and boxes of flowers outside the house.There is also a very popular Pub in the village.
